DPRK Delegation Leaves for Foreign Countries 
   Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A DPRK friendship delegation led by Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is also vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People, left here today by air to visit Finland, Sweden and Denmark.
